name: Owlgod Forest
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 43 in 24 hours.

Cult simulator, but with a twist.

Instructions:
-Arrow keys to move camera.
-Click to select your cultists and to order them to move.
-Sacrifice cultists to banish monstrosities and to turn humans into new cultists.
-Banish all monstrosities, but at least one human and one cultist must survive.

Get in touch on twitter
